document_data.caption: A map of Triboar showing the Tower at the center of town.
document_data.name: Tower of the Lord Protector
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tower of the Lord Protector''' was a two-story keep in the center of [[Triboar]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} and late 15{{th}} centuries [[DR]]. It was the residence of the ruler of the town, titled the Lord Protector.
document_data.Structure: The keep was made of stone, was of simple design, and leaned noticeably eastward. It got quite dusty.
